name: Coin Dropper
description:
Inspired by the classic arcade machines. Begin by entering the Lobby and navigating the impossibly small arcade. The first room contains 3 arcade cabinets with variations on the coin dropper theme.

Directly behind the machines is a vendor area, just like the arcade! Exchange prizes earned from playing for tickets, or cash in tickets and buy it all.

Through the doorway lies the Trophy Room where prizes you’ve earned or bought will slowly fill up display cases for you to enjoy. Check back often to see your progress.

There is no end goal, no real-world riches to to be had, so enjoy this simple little game for what it is. Yes I know the start screen is atrocious.

Thanks for playing!
